A2 [ C ] mainly US (UK usually flat) a set of rooms for living in, especially on one floor of a building: I'll give you the keys to my apartment. They have six luxury apartments for sale. a holiday apartment apartments [ plural ] mainly UK
a set of large rooms with expensive furniture and decoration in, for example, a public building or castle: The Royal Apartments are open to the public.
